segments.text: Yes , the wine list is at the end of the menu .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I see . Don't you have Mao Tai ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir , but I recommend you Bacardi White . It's quite delitous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's fine . Bring us a bottle of that .
segments.speaker: S1
